episodes.title: 5 Evil & Hated Cults That Shook the World | True Crime Documentary
episodes.description:
Enter the dark world of history’s most evil and despised cults in this gripping true-crime style documentary. From deadly mass suicides to psychological control and public outrage, we reveal the shocking stories behind five of the most infamous groups ever exposed.

0:23 – Heaven's Gate Cult  
3:57 – The Children of God  
7:10 – The People's Temple  
10:55 – Westboro Baptist Church  
14:06 – The Manson Family  

Through survivor accounts, historical records, and chilling analysis, we uncover how these cults gained power, controlled followers, and ultimately faced justice.  
Subscribe to Seeking Answers for more deep-dive true crime investigations into history’s darkest mysteries.

Business enquiries: rob.berni@Seekinganswers.co.uk
